trans-unit.source: Temporary tables in SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Temporary tables in SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Tips for using temporary tables in Azure SQL Data Warehouse for developing solutions.
trans-unit.target: Tips for using temporary tables in Azure SQL Data Warehouse for developing solutions.

trans-unit.source: Temporary tables exist at the session level in SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: Temporary tables exist at the session level in SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: They are defined as local temporary tables and unlike SQL Server tables they can be accessed from anywhere inside the session.
trans-unit.target: They are defined as local temporary tables and unlike SQL Server tables they can be accessed from anywhere inside the session.

trans-unit.source: Temporary tables are very useful when processing data - especially during transformation where the intermediate results are transient.
trans-unit.target: Temporary tables are very useful when processing data - especially during transformation where the intermediate results are transient.

trans-unit.source: This article highlights some specific methods for leveraging temporary tables to help you modularize your code.
trans-unit.target: This article highlights some specific methods for leveraging temporary tables to help you modularize your code.

trans-unit.source: The fact that temporary tables can be seen anywhere in a user session can be exploited to help you modularize your application code.
trans-unit.target: The fact that temporary tables can be seen anywhere in a user session can be exploited to help you modularize your application code.

trans-unit.source: Lets make a working example.
trans-unit.target: Lets make a working example.

trans-unit.source: The stored procedure below generates the DDL required to update the statistics on every column in the database:
trans-unit.target: The stored procedure below generates the DDL required to update the statistics on every column in the database:

trans-unit.source: Notice that nothing has actually been done with this data.
trans-unit.target: Notice that nothing has actually been done with this data.

trans-unit.source: The procedure has simply generated the DDL and stored it in a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: The procedure has simply generated the DDL and stored it in a temporary table.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible in SQL Data Warehouse to use that temporary table outside of the procedure that created it.
trans-unit.target: However, it is possible in SQL Data Warehouse to use that temporary table outside of the procedure that created it.

trans-unit.source: This is different to SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: This is different to SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: In fact the temporary table can be used anywhere inside the session.
trans-unit.target: In fact the temporary table can be used anywhere inside the session.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to more modular and manageable code.
trans-unit.target: This can lead to more modular and manageable code.

trans-unit.source: In some cases inline and multi-statement functions can also be replaced using this technique.
trans-unit.target: In some cases inline and multi-statement functions can also be replaced using this technique.

trans-unit.source: You can also extend this solution.
trans-unit.target: You can also extend this solution.

trans-unit.source: If you only wanted to update a single table for example all you would need to do is just filter the #stats_ddl table
trans-unit.target: If you only wanted to update a single table for example all you would need to do is just filter the #stats_ddl table

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse does impose a couple of limitations when implementing temporary tables.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse does impose a couple of limitations when implementing temporary tables.

trans-unit.source: The main limitations are:
trans-unit.target: The main limitations are:

trans-unit.source: Global Temporary Tables are not supported
trans-unit.target: Global Temporary Tables are not supported

trans-unit.source: Views cannot be created on temporary tables
trans-unit.target: Views cannot be created on temporary tables

trans-unit.source: For more development tips, see <linkText>development overview</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more development tips, see <linkText>development overview</linkText><title></title>.
